data.title: Return Merchandise Authorization
data.meta_description: Contact Gamber-Johnson Service Support | Return for Repair | Return of Stock | Repair Warranty | End-of-Support | 3rd Party Service Support
data.text:
At Gamber-Johnson, our goal is to ensure your satisfaction. When problems arise, support for your docking station is only a phone call away. Gamber-Johnson’s technical support team will assist you in diagnosing the problem and, if necessary, will assist you with an RMA number, perform the needed repair and testing, and return the product.

If you’re more of a DIY person, check out our FAQs or Bench Test and Troubleshoot Guide to assist you on your path.

For 3rd party service requests, refer to the links below.

Return for Repair (RFR)

An RMA number must be obtained from Gamber‐Johnson prior to the return of any product for Warranty or Non-Warranty repairs. RMA number must be written on the outside of all packages being returned. A diagnostic fee will be charged per docking station and applied to the cost of the repair. If the customer decides not to repair the unit, the fee will be billed to the customer.

For U.S. Customers:

For International Customers:

AUTHORIZED SERVICE CENTERS

Return to Stock (RTS)

Product being returned for credit due to customer purchasing or shipping error must be returned within 30 days of the ship date. An RMA number must be obtained from Gamber‐Johnson prior to the return of any merchandise. RMA number must be written on the outside of all packages being returned. Products purchased through a distributor of Gamber-Johnson must have the RMA number obtained by the distributor from Gamber‐Johnson. Shipping costs are the responsibility of the customer and a restocking fee of 15% of goods returned will be assessed. Additional costs may apply in unusual circumstances (e.g. large order quantities). Product not in resalable condition or custom orders cannot be returned.

Return to Stock Form (Authenticated users only)

Repair Warranty

Repairs completed by Gamber‐Johnson are warranted for a period of 90 days from completion of repair (unless otherwise specifically stated) or the balance of the warranty remaining on the product; whichever is longer. All other terms and conditions remain the same as set forth in the warranty above.

End-of-Support (EOS)

3rd Party Service Support
